# HardWareID
获取pc硬件码（基本通过shell命令获取）

### 一、支持三端Windows、Linux、OSX

OSX:

```
QY-MBP:HardWareID qinyao$ clang++ HardWareID.cpp -o HardWareID
QY-MBP:HardWareID qinyao$ ./HardWareID
HARDWARE ID :



QY-MBP:HardWareID qinyao$
```

Linux:

```
[qy@localhost HWID_ALL]$ clang++ HardWareID.cpp -o HardWareID
[qy@localhost HWID_ALL]$ ./HardWareID 

HARDWARE ID : 



[qy@localhost HWID_ALL]$ 

```

Windows:

```

```

### 二、验证

验证使用同一套代码，验证前后HardWareID是否一样。
